name: Starfighter3D
description:
Ever been to space? well neither have I. Explore the solar system of Starfighter and fend off these space pirates. Get through green rings and eliminate all space pirates that will try to hunt you down. Enjoy!!!

Our first ever created game in Unity. A learning experience and perhaps one we can expand upon in the future.

Project Contributors:

https://jasosantiago.itch.io/

https://warcramspartanix.itch.io/
